# GGPlot Library Function

GGPlot is a popular data visualization library for the R programming language that allows users to create quality plots quickly and easily. It is a powerful tool for creating high-level graphics from data stored in data frames that has been used extensively to create informative and effective visualizations.

## What package contains it

The library is part of the `ggplot2` package and can be used to create powerful graphics from data stored in data frames.

## When to Use it

GGplot is best used for making statistical graphs and plots,
